title: yogg
author: yogg
content: Q2 2021 History ColdkeyHere is the release for the Q2 2021 History Coldkey series.It is comprised of the April 2021, May 2021 and June 2021 History Coldkeys.The total funding for 1 set of 3 Coldkeys is 0.00367638 BTC.Serialization goes from #1 to #64.#1 to #32 is mostly kept aside for previous subscribers.#33 to #64 will be sold on our website soon.The pictures do not justice to our Coldkeys as usual.About subscriptions :You can keep claiming your prefered serial number if you wish !Please post in this thread, or PM either owlcatz and myself.Some past subscribers have already been satisfied, but we are hanging onto a few serials as we didn't reach out to everyone.April 2021 : On the 1st of April 2021, 1 BTC was 50 247€.0.00099508BTC represented ~50€ on that day.May 2021 :On the 1st of May 2021, 1 BTC was 48 017€.0.00104128BTC represented ~50€ on that day.June 2021 :On the 1st of June 2021, 1 BTC was 30 487€.0.00164002BTC represented ~50€ on that day.The artwork has been commissioned to an artist that is not active in the crypto-sphere.However, there are still additional surprises to come as the background follows certain guidelines. Price : 45 € per History Coldkey.Funding must be provided on top of the price, in the form of BTCHistory Coldkeys are shipped to you not funded. A document with steps to follow is included, so you can get your Coldkeys as soon as you follow these steps.In case of parcel loss or disappearance, we will reship your order in full. Get yours by placing an order on our shop ! >> https://www.coldkey.eu/shop <<After your order confirmation, please pay attention to your mailbox as you will receive further emails to collect the BTC funding for your order.If you have any question about our Coldkeys or a suggestion, it will be a pleasure to answer to you ! All your feedbacks are very important for us !Thank you for reading !

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Will be ordering my set tonight - i want to complete the 2021 year

comments.body: These are awesome, great job, I'm going to need some display stands 👍

comments.body: Ordered paid btc sent waiting near mailbox :p

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Mine have arrived - not sure where your order is in comparison to mine. Yogg gets backlogged at times but I have known him to not eventually deliver on everything that has been ordered/paid for.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: I also recieved all my recent coldkey orders a few days ago

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: I FINALLY just ordered mine as well...

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Hi yogg,looks like I missed a lot.   Is it still possible to get this ones with my previous serial number?
